message: New to Convore and eager to find out how well it works. Consider this my first post.
Well it works intuitively, that's for sure. Signed up and good to go within a minute.
Well you can delete you messages as well, but the javascript pop-up isn't as nifty as the rest of the website
@jaap yes, good point.
ah, was interest in the 'new message' thingy as well, kind of 'in your face, please respond ASAP' don't you think?
@jaap no I don't mind that as much
but it looks like a valuable tool for our small business, replacing the group IM which doesn't allow for (easy) trackback of conversations/shared links
Was Convore w
Was Convore what google wave should have been?
@markcahill funny I was kind of thinking the same thing, although Google Wave actually used xmpp (I believe) to make it so you could watch people typing. Real, real time.
A/S/L?
This is pretty cool, could see this being a replacement for FF, I also thought about Google Wave !!
@markcahill I couldn't help but wonder the same thing.
found a bug already. i tried searching for this group under "the next web" and it didn't find this group...
anyone else experiencing a super super slow scrolling on these chats? I know I have an old laptop but dam this is ridiculous.
Not I.
Scrolling fine here. Friendfeed 2.0 :-)
I'm likin' it.
Mostly workson iPad too
hello . checking it out
Cool stuff!
Hello Boris :)
hi
I miss a place to get an overview of all recent messages
@iconfinder Yeah, I'd love to see a 'Timeline' of unread/recent messages (like Twitter timeline)
is this something like Twitter or it is like a real chat?
It seems to be like a chat, interesting
hi
ok so how does this work?
test
it doesn't really feel like a chat, does it? it's some sort of crossover, like (DUN DUN DUN) Google Buzz
slow-slow-chat?
Reading text matter on convore looks poor. Its a bit to sharp. Facebook and blogspot reading is convenient and so is quora
Is it possible to see a list of my latest posted messages?
havent seen that yet
wow
Hey Boris! Long Time no See!
sup
Hello world, we have something new and cool: www.zapon.com - it is a mobile app and currently we tease. Ping me for early access.
What's up?

We have just openend the Private BETA of zapon - http://bit.ly/hN4Nzu - With zapon you can communicate in real-time with other people, all based on your favorite Interests - Join us in the Interest Graph Revolution! http://bit.ly/hN4Nzu
New app launching soon in NYC looking for early adopters with digital content: http://igobubble.com/content
